recipes.title: Loading Recipes & Items
recipes.duplicate: Ignoring duplicate recipe %namespace%:%key% with the config file %key%.%file_type%!
recipes.incompatible: Unsupported file type! Ignoring %namespace%:%key% with the config file %key%.%file_type%!

outdated.msg: <red>Your version is outdated! A new version is available!</red>

invalid_namespacedkey: <red>The folder and key must be lowercase and must only</red>

input.mini_message:
<#00ccff>Use MiniMessage uses tags instead of the legacy color codes!
These tags can be used to specify:
* Colors: <#FD6684><_colorname_>
<#FD6684>\: Green
<#FD6684>\<#5662F6>: <#5662F6>Hex-Color
... etc.

* Decorations:
<#FD6684>\, <#FD6684>\: Bold,
<#FD6684>\, <#FD6684>\, <#FD6684>\: Italic,
<#FD6684>\, <#FD6684>\: Underline,
<#FD6684>\, <#FD6684>\: Strikethrough,
<#FD6684>\, <#FD6684>\: Obfuscated

* Gradients: <#FD6684>[color1]:<#50E975>[color...]:<#50E975>[phase]>
<#FD6684>\||||||||||||||||||||||||<#FD6684>\: ||||||||||||||||||||||||
<#FD6684>\#5e4fa2:<#50E975>#f79459>||||||||||||||||||||||||<#FD6684>\: ||||||||||||||||||||||||
<#FD6684>\#5e4fa2:<#50E975>#f79459:<#50E975>red>||||||||||||||||||||||||<#FD6684>\: ||||||||||||||||||||||||

* Fonts: <#FD6684>\key>
<#FD6684>\uniform>Uniform<#FD6684>\: Uniform
<#FD6684>\alt>Alt<#FD6684>\: Alt

* and more

(Click) Open Link to Wiki'>MiniMessage for color & formatting!
input.wui_command:
<#00ccff>Use the Use the /wui command to input your values, instead of typing it straight into the chat!
It provides tab completion & prevents issues with chat plugins!

Simply write your input after the command with a space in between.
Like this: /wui your input here

(Click) Fill in Command'>/wui command to input your values!

list_edit.title: <grey>┌──── [<green>Modify List</green>]</grey>
list_edit.input_new_entry: <white>Type in the new value for the <list_entry>. Entry
list_edit.input_add_entry: <white>Type in a value for the new entry.

help: <yellow>darkmode   <grey>-</grey> Toggles the darkmode/lightmode of the GUI</yellow>
<yellow>debug      <grey>-</grey> Toggles the debug mode. Might spam a lot of messages!</yellow>
<yellow>lockdown   <grey>-</grey> Toggles LockDown mode. If enabled no custom recipe can be crafted!</yellow>
For more info visit the Wiki:

lockdown.disabled: [Lockdown] OFF! Custom recipes will no longer get blocked!
lockdown.confirm: Lockdown ist currently ! To toggle Lockdown run /cc lockdown confirm

advanced_crafting_table.name: Advanced Crafting Table
description: <grey>Enable recipe to only work in the </grey>

craft_delay.name: Craft Delay
description: <grey>needs to wait for to craft again.</grey>

player_scoreboard.name: Player Scoreboard
description: <red>Must be configured in the recipes JSON Config!</red>

player/custom_check.name: Custom Player Check
description: <red>Must be configured in the recipes JSON Config!</red>

patreon.name: ➥ <#FF424D>tt Patreon tt
lore: <grey>Become a Patron and get access to </grey>

github.name: ❖ GitHub
lore: <yellow>Need a Wiki, tutorials, or wanna contribute?</yellow>
<yellow>Have a look at the GitHub repository.</yellow>

discord.name: ❖ Discord
lore: <yellow>Feel free to join the Discord server!</yellow>

gui_help: <grey>- </grey><yellow>Click the Recipe type for that you </yellow>
<yellow>would like to create a new recipe.</yellow>

brewing_stand_disabled.name: ❌ Brewing Stand Recipe
lore: <red>You must enable them in the config!
<red>Note: The development is on Hold, and
<red>      they might not work as intended!

gui_help: <grey>Special thanks to my Patrons for supporting</grey>

lore: <yellow>Become a Patron and get early access and take part</yellow>

gui_help: <yellow>If a recipe is disabled it can't be crafted by anyone!</yellow>

disabled.name: □ One-Line Printing
lore: <grey>Json configs are saved in one line!</grey>

enabled.name: Debug
lore: <grey>You may get a lot of messages from now on!</grey>

enabled.name: ■ Background
lore: <grey>Each GUI Menu has a Glass Pane Background</grey>

disabled.name: □ Background
lore: <grey>GUIs don't have any Glass Pane Background!</grey>
<red>This makes crafting grids and other input slots</red>
<red>invisible. A Custom Texture Menu should be used!</red>

enabled.name: ✔ Keep Last Open
lore: <grey>When reopening the recipe book it opens</grey>
<grey>the menu the player last left on.</grey>
<grey>[<green>Shift Left-Click</green>]</grey><yellow> Give Full Stack of Item</yellow>

gui_help: <grey>Place in the item you want to edit in top middle</grey>
<yellow>Some features are only available if you save the item!</yellow>

input.line1:
Type in the /data//items/.conf

The folder can be used to group your items and nested folders are allowed!
Input your folder and name like this: /wui

Make sure the folder and name only contain:
- lowercase letters,
- numbers,
- underscores,
- or dashes!
Use /wui to get input assistance, like tab completions!'>folder and item name, under which to save the item

amount.error: <red>Error parsing number! Is it a number? It should be!</red>

damage.invalid_type: <red>The current item does not support damage value!</red>

repair.invalid_type: <red>The current item does not support repair cost!</red>
repair.invalid_value: <red>The value <dark_red>%VALUE%</dark_red> is not a valid number!</red>

fuel.invalid_value: <red>The value <dark_red>%VALUE%</dark_red> is not a valid number!</red>

custom_model_data.invalid_value: <red>The value <dark_red>%VALUE%</dark_red> is not a valid Model Data number!</red>

custom_model_data_new.error_invalid_value: <red>The value <dark_red>%VALUE%</dark_red> is not a valid Model Data <yellow>%DATA_TYPE%</yellow> value!</red>
custom_model_data_new.error_not_enough_args_rgb: <red>Not enough arguments provided - 'RGB 100 100 100' is valid format!</red>
custom_model_data_new.error_not_enough_args_argb: <red>Not enough arguments provided - 'ARGB 255 100 100 100' is valid format!</red>
custom_model_data_new.color_error: <red>Invalid arguments provided - 'RGB 1 1 1' or 'ARGB 1 1 1 1' or 'AQUA' (+ other colors) are valid!</red>

consume.invalid: <red>This is not a Number! Please type in a Valid number e.g. <yellow>1 </yellow>or<yellow> -1</yellow></red>

invalid_version.name: <red>Invalid Minecraft Version</red>
lore: <grey>You need at least 1.14 to use this feature!</grey>

save_item.name: ▷ Save Item
lore: <yellow>Saves the item under the existing folder and key!</yellow>

save_item_as.name: ✎ Save As...
lore: <grey>Save the item with a new folder and key.</grey>
<red>The folder and key must be lowercase and</red>

cancel.name: <grey>➦</grey> <red><b>Cancel
lore: <red>Some options are only available when saving the item!
<red>Those options will not apply to the item!

wolfyutilities.name: WolfyUtilities
lore: <gold>To edit the item use CustomCrafting or the API!</gold>

meta_ignore.name: <grey>Mode: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
lore: <yellow>Change the way this meta is checked!</yellow>
<grey>Numeric meta can also be configured to</grey>
<grey>only allow for Higher or Lower values!</grey>
help: <dark_aqua>EXACT </dark_aqua><grey>- Meta must be exactly the same!</grey>
<dark_aqua>IGNORE </dark_aqua><grey>- Meta is ignored and not needed!</grey>
<dark_aqua>HIGHER </dark_aqua><grey>- The value can be higher than the set value!</grey>
<dark_aqua>LOWER </dark_aqua><grey>- The value can be lower than the set value!</grey>

set.name: <grey>✎ <gold><b>Set Display Name
set.message: <white>Type in the new name for the item.

apply.name: <gold>Apply Texture</gold>
lore: <yellow>Applies the texture of the Player Head</yellow>
<grey>«« </grey><yellow>Put the player head with the texture in the empty slot!</yellow>

add.name: <green>Add Potion Effect</green>
lore: <yellow>This will open a GUI where you can</yellow>

remove.name: <dark_red>Remove Potion Effect</dark_red>
lore: <yellow>Remove a Potion Effect of a specific type.</yellow>
<yellow>This will open a GUI where you can click the</yellow>
remove.message: <yellow>Type in the Potion name you want to remove!</yellow>

add_number.name: %C%Add number
lore: §eAdds all of the modifiers' amounts to the current value of the attribute.

add_scalar.name: %C%Multiply number
lore: <yellow>Multiplies the current value of the attribute by (1 + x), </yellow>
<yellow>where x is the sum of the modifiers' amounts</yellow>

multiply_scalar_1.name: %C%Multiply scalar
lore: <yellow>The most complex option! Enable help (Top Right) for more info!</yellow>
<yellow>For every modifier, multiplies the current value of the attribute by (1 + x),</yellow>
<yellow>where x is the amount of the particular modifier.</yellow>
help: <yellow>Functions the same as Operation 1(Multiply) if there is only a single modifier </yellow>
<yellow>However, for multiple modifiers it will multiply the modifiers </yellow>
<yellow>For example, modifying an attribute with {Amount:2,Operation:2} and </yellow>
<yellow>{Amount:4,Operation:2} with a Base of 3 results in 45 (3*(1 + 2)*(1 + 4) = 45)</yellow>

save.name: <green>Add Attribute</green>
lore: <yellow>Applies an attribute modifier to the item</yellow>

set_amount.name: <grey>Amount: </grey><yellow>%NUMBER%</yellow>
set_amount.message: <yellow>Type in the amount you want! For example<gold> 0.4</gold></yellow>

set_uuid.name: <grey>UUID: </grey><yellow>%UUID%</yellow>
set_uuid.message: <yellow>Type in the uuid for the attribute! Must be a valid UUID!</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Set Item Damage</gold>
lore: <grey>Set the damage value of the Item</grey>

option.name: <gold>Repair Cost</gold>
lore: <grey>Set the repair cost for this item!</grey>

option.name: <gold>Fuel Settings</gold>
lore: <grey>Allow this item to be used as fuel in furnaces.</grey>

set.name: <green>Burn Time: </green><grey>%VAR% ticks</grey>
help: <red>Set it to 0 will disable this to be</red>
set.message: <yellow>Type in the Burn Time in ticks!</yellow>

reset.name: <red>Reset Burn Time</red>
lore: <grey>The item item will not be saved</grey>

option.name: <gold>Durability Cost & Replacement</gold>
lore: <grey>Create a item that looses durability or gets replaced</grey>

enabled.name: <grey>Durability cost: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
lore: <grey> 0 = </grey><dark_aqua>removed completely! Use replacement to prevent it!</dark_aqua>
enabled.message: <yellow>Type in the durability cost, which will be subtracted from the item when used in the crafting grid</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Custom Durability & Damage</gold>
lore: <grey>Set Custom Durability and damage to your item!</grey>
<grey>This will replace the vanilla Durability and Damage!</grey>

remove.name: <red>Remove</red>
lore: <yellow>Remove the Custom Durability of this item.</yellow>

set_durability.name: <grey>Set Durability: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
lore: <yellow>Set a custom durability for this item.</yellow>

set_damage.name: <grey>Set Damage: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
set_damage.message: <yellow>Type in the custom Damage of the item. <red>Max value: 2,147,483,647</red></yellow>

set_tag.name: <grey>Set Tag: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
lore: <yellow>Set the tag which displays the durability and damage</yellow>
set_tag.message: <yellow>Type in the Tag that should appear at the bottom of the lore! %dur%</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Permission</gold>
lore: <grey>Set the permission needed to get this item</grey>
<grey>e.g. used it for crafting or anvil recipes results</grey>

set.name: <grey>Set Permssion: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
set.message: <yellow>Type in the permission string that players need to get this item</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Rarity </gold><dark_grey>[<grey>Beta</grey>]</dark_grey>
lore: <grey>This value can be used in crafting or anvil results</grey>

set.name: <grey>Set Rarity Percentage: <dark_aqua>%VAR%</dark_aqua></grey>
lore: <grey>Type in a value of 1.0 or lower</grey>
set.message: <yellow>Type in the percentage of how rare this item should be. <red>The number must be smaller than 1.0!</red></yellow>

option.name: <gold>Persistent NBT Data </gold>
lore: <grey>Store custom data in NBT, linked to an key.</grey>

option.name: <gold>Elite Workbench </gold><dark_grey>[<grey>Beta</grey>]</dark_grey>
lore: <grey>Create and Configure your own unique Workbench</grey>

size_6.name: Grid size: 6x6 [Deprecated]
lore: <red>Recipes need more resources and are going to</red>
<red>result in lag if used too often in a short time!</red>
<red>Make sure to use the <yellow>Craft Delay</yellow> Condition!</red>

enabled.name: <green>Normal Recipes Allowed</green>
lore: <grey>Normal Recipes & Elite Recipes can be crafted.</grey>
<yellow>Custom Recipes which are not specificly created for the Advanced Workbench</yellow>

particles.name: <gold>Particle Effects</gold>
lore: <red>Must be configured in the json config of the item!</red>

option.name: <gold>Knowledge Book</gold>
lore: <grey>Enable this Item to work as the Knowledge Book</grey>

option.name: <gold>Custom Equipment</gold>
lore: <grey>Configure the armor slots this item can</grey>

option.name: <gold>Particle Effects </gold><dark_grey>[<grey>Experimental</grey>]</dark_grey>
lore: <red>Must be configured in the json config!</red>

option.name: <gold>Vanilla Settings</gold>
lore: <grey>e.g. block the use in vanilla recipes</grey>

disabled.name: <red>Disabled</red>
lore: <yellow>Item can be used in vanilla recipes</yellow>

save_as.name: ✎ Save As...
lore: <grey>Save the recipe under a new folder and key!</grey>
<red>The folder and key must be lowercase and</red>

disabled.name: ✔ Show Recipe
lore: <yellow>Recipe is shown in the recipe book.</yellow>

vanilla_book_discover.name: ❏ Vanilla Recipe Book & Auto Discover
lore: <yellow>Recipe will be visible in the vanilla</yellow>
<yellow>recipe book and auto discovered on join! </yellow>
<red>NBT for ingredients will not be displayed & </red>

vanilla_book_no_discover.name: ❏ Vanilla Recipe Book
lore: <yellow>Recipe will be visible in the vanilla</yellow>
<red>NBT for ingredients will not be displayed & </red>

no_vanilla_book.name: ❏ No Vanilla Recipe Book
lore: <yellow>Recipe is not visible in the vanilla</yellow>

disabled.name: ■ Shaped Recipe
lore: <yellow>i.e. They must to be placed, into</yellow>

tags.name: ➥ Tags
lore: <grey>that can make creation a lot easier.</grey>

group.name: ✎ Recipe Group ID
lore: <yellow>Recipes with the same group id are</yellow>
<yellow>grouped together in one slot of the recipe book.</yellow>
<yellow>Similar to wood variants in vanilla Minecraft.</yellow>

global_messages.override: <white>Type the folder and key of the recipe

group_id.invalid: <red>The group contains an invalid character. Please note that color codes are not necessary as the ids are only used internally!

save.input:
Type in the /data//recipes/.conf

The folder can be used to group your recipes and nested folders are allowed!
Input your folder and name like this: /wui

Make sure the folder and name only contain:
- lowercase letters,
- numbers,
- underscores,
- or dashes!
Use /wui to get input assistance, like tab completions!'>folder and recipe name, under which to save the recipe

key.invalid:
<red>The input is not a valid folder or key! 
Make sure it only contains: 
 - lowercase letters,
 - numbers,
 - underscores, 
 - or dashes!
 - You cannot use the minecraft namespace!
Use <yellow>/wui </yellow>to get input assistance, like tab completion!</red>

save.empty: <red>Cannot save a empty recipe! Check the Result and the source/ingredients</red>

loading.warning: <red>It is better to restart the Server after you're done, to prevent recipes from not working correctly!</red>

add.name: Add World
add.message: <yellow>Type in the world name to add.</yellow>

remove.name: Remove World
lore: <grey>Remove the last world of the values.</grey>

add.name: Add Biome
add.message: <yellow>Type in the Biome you want to add! Usage: <gold><biome_name></gold></yellow>

add.name: Add Elite Crafting Table
add.message: <white>Type in the folder and key of the elite crafting table item!</white>

set.name: Set Craft Delay
set.message: <yellow>Type in the craft delay in milliseconds! Usage: <gold><craft_delay></gold></yellow>

add.name: Add Advancement
add.message: <yellow>Type in the advancement namespace and key! <gold>/wui</gold> for tab-completion!</yellow>

remove.name: Remove Advancement
lore: <grey>Remove the last advancement of the values.</grey>

messages.elite_workbench: <yellow>Type in the namespace and key of the CustomItem! Example: <gold>[namespace] [key]</gold></yellow>
messages.error: <red>This item does not exist or is not loaded!</red>
messages.no_name: <red>You need to type in the item key!</red>
messages.not_elite_workbench: <red>This item is not an Elite Workbench!</red>
messages.craft_limit: <yellow>Type in the limit (How many times the recipe can be crafted! Shift-Click = 1 use)</yellow>

gui_help: <yellow>Shift<grey>+Right click on Result or Ingredients will </grey></yellow>
<yellow>Shift <grey>+ Right click on Result or Ingredients will </grey></yellow>

xp.name: ✎ Experience
xp.message: <dark_aqua>Type in the amount of experience. e.g. 0.5</dark_aqua>

cooking_time.name: ✎ Cooking Time
cooking_time.message: <yellow>Type in the cooking time in ticks. e.g. 20. <red>Max value: 32767</red></yellow>

mode.name: ❏ Mode: %MODE%
lore: <green>None </green><grey>- Acts the same as vanilla recipes.</grey>
<green>Durability </green><grey>- Same as None, plus you can modify</grey>

repair_cost.name: ✎ Repair Cost: %VAR%
repair_cost.message: <yellow>Type in the amount of the repair cost (in levels). <red>Must be greater than 0!</red></yellow>

durability.name: ✎ Damage Repair: %VAR%
durability.message: <dark_aqua>Type in the amount of durability. </dark_aqua><gold>>0 increase</gold><grey>, </grey><0 decrease

repair_mode.name: ❏ Repair Cost Mode: %VAR%
lore: <yellow>This mode specifies how the repair cost</yellow>
<yellow>should be affected by the left ingredient!</yellow>

messages.mythicMob:
<yellow>Type in the mob you want to add.
<<gold>mob_name</gold>> <<gold>level</gold>> [<<gold>x</gold>> <<gold>y</gold>> <<gold>z</gold>>]</yellow>

xp.name: ✎ Experience
xp.message: <dark_aqua>Type in the amount of experience. e.g. 2</dark_aqua>

cookingTime.name: ✎ Cooking Time
cookingTime.message: <yellow>Type in the cooking time in ticks. e.g. 20</yellow>

fluid_level.name: ✎ Fluid Level
lore: <yellow>Consumes the specified level of the fluid.</yellow>
<yellow>When Lava is used, it consumes the whole</yellow>
fluid_level.message: <yellow>Type in the amount of water the cauldron needs to have! <red>Max: <dark_red>3</dark_red></red></yellow>

gui_help: <grey><yellow>Shift</yellow> + <yellow>Right click</yellow> on Result or Ingredients will</grey>

xp.name: ✎ Experience
xp.message: <yellow>Type in the amount of experience. e.g. 0.5</yellow>

messages.duration_change: <yellow>Type in the amount of ticks the potions duration should change</yellow>
messages.amplifier_change: <yellow>Type in the amount of levels the potions amplifier should change</yellow>

brewing_stand.name: <gold>Brewing Stand Ingredient</gold>
lore: <yellow>Put the ingredient into the one slot on the left!</yellow>
<grey>« Shift + Right Click to set multiple items.</grey>

allowed_items.name: <gold>Allowed Potions</gold>
lore: <yellow>Put the Items that this recipe allows</yellow>
<yellow>into the one slot on the left!</yellow>
<grey>« Shift + Right Click to set multiple items.</grey>
<yellow>These items will checked against the 3 slots at</yellow>
<yellow>If empty all items are allowed and can further</yellow>

enabled.name: <red>Reset Potion Effects</red>
lore: <yellow>Potion Effects are reset for each potion!</yellow>

disabled.name: <grey>Keep Potion Effects</grey>
lore: <yellow>Potion Effects are kept for each potion!</yellow>

effect_color.name: <gold>Effect RGB Color</gold>
lore: <yellow>This option sets the specific color to potions.</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Required Effects </gold><grey>[<dark_grey>Coming Soon]</dark_grey></grey>
lore: <yellow>Configure the effects that the potions need to contain!</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Effect Removals</gold>
lore: <yellow>Configure Effect Types to be removed from the Potions</yellow>

info.name: <gold>Effects</gold>
lore: <yellow>The effects will be removed from the Potions!</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Effect Additions</gold>
lore: <yellow>Configure Effects that are added to the Potions</yellow>

info.name: <gold>Potion Effects</gold>
lore: <yellow>These effects are added to the Potions</yellow>

potion_effect.name: <gold>Potion Effect</gold>
lore: <yellow>Click Apply to apply them to the list.</yellow>

disabled.name: <gold>Kept</gold>
lore: <yellow>Effect will be not replaced if the</yellow>

apply.name: <gold>Apply</gold>
lore: <yellow>Apply effect to the list of effect additions!</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Effect Upgrades</gold>
lore: <yellow>Set the amount of levels and duration that are added.</yellow>

info.name: <gold>Effect Upgrades</gold>
lore: <yellow>These effects are added onto the Potions.</yellow>
<yellow>Below is a more detailed List (with internal Potion names!):</yellow>

amplifier.name: <gold>Amplifier</gold>
lore: <yellow>This value will be added onto the</yellow>

duration.name: <gold>Duration</gold>
lore: <yellow>This value will be added onto the</yellow>

add_type.name: <gold>Potion Effect Type</gold>
lore: <yellow>The settings will be added onto the</yellow>
<yellow>The example Potion Effect on this item</yellow>

apply.name: <gold>Apply Upgrade</gold>
lore: <yellow>There can only be one upgrade per</yellow>

option.name: <gold>Result</gold>
lore: <yellow>This option will override the other upgrade, </yellow>

info.name: <gold>Configure Results</gold>
lore: <yellow>« Configure your results that will replace the Potions!</yellow>
<grey>« Shift + Right Click to set multiple items.</grey>

enabled.name: Material Only
lore: <red>Any nbt of the result is ignored!</red>

gui_help: <grey>Setup the variants of the chosen slot.</grey>
<grey>Put in as many Items you want.</grey>
<yellow>Shift <grey>+ Right click will open the ItemEditor</grey></yellow>

enabled.name: ✔ Craft Remains
lore: <yellow>if it is a CustomItem that has it enabled.</yellow>

target.name: Target [Config Only]
lore: <grey>Allows to target an Ingredient slot of the recipe</grey>
<grey>and merge it's data into the result or</grey>
<grey>manipulate the resulting item in other ways.</grey>

extensions.name: Extensions [Config Only]
lore: <grey>They can be commands, mob spawning, sound, etc.</grey>

create_item.name: ➥ Edit
lore: <grey>Edit the Stack using the Item Creator</grey>
<grey>Swaps the current parser with this parser</grey>

world_time.name: » World Time «
lore: <grey>This recipe can be crafted when the </grey>

adv_workbench_off.name: <gold>Every Crafting Table</gold>
lore: <grey>Can be crafted in every Crafting Table</grey>

save.input: <yellow>Type in the key! Must be alphanumeric lowercase! [a-z0-9/._-]</yellow>

filters.name: ➥ Filters
lore: <yellow>The Filters are present on top of </yellow>

categories.name: ➥ Categories
lore: <yellow>If there is only one Category available</yellow>
<yellow>the Gui will directly open the one Category</yellow>

cancel.name: ❌ Cancel
lore: <grey>Reverts changes made to the Recipe Book!</grey>
<red>All your changes since the last save will be discarded!

save.name: ▷ Save
lore: <grey>Save Recipe Book settings to the config!</grey>
<grey>To load and apply the changes you need</grey>

disabled.name: Manually
lore: <red>If a group is not contained in</red>

cancel.name: <red>Cancel</red>
lore: <yellow>Cancels the creation of this Potion Effect.</yellow>

potion_effect_type.name: <grey>Effect Type: </grey><dark_aqua>%effect_type%</dark_aqua>
lore: <yellow>Choose the Type of this Potion Effect</yellow>

duration.name: <grey>Duration: </grey><dark_aqua>%duration%</dark_aqua>
lore: <yellow>Set the duration of the Potion Effect</yellow>
duration.message: <yellow>Type in the Duration number value in ticks! 20 ticks = 1 sec</yellow>

amplifier.name: <grey>Amplifier: </grey><dark_aqua>%amplifier%</dark_aqua>
lore: <yellow>Set the amplifier of the Potion Effect</yellow>
